name: bj-disjcsn

body.origin:
|- wceq(cin(c0, csn(c0)), emptycls)
-| wn(wcel(c0, c0))
-| wb(wceq(cin(c0, csn(c0)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, c0)))

comment: A class is disjoint from its singleton. A consequence of regularity. Shorter proof than ~ bnj521 and does not depend on ~ df-ne . (Contributed by BJ, 4-Apr-2019.)
